name: Le Gatuno - Demo
description:
Le Gatuno is a platform game made for #GBJAM5

We are releasing this game on Play Store with more levels pretty soon. For updates & more games visit us at informalpenguins.com or give us a like in our facebook page.

Controls:

You only need to jump. You can either click/tap the screen or press "Space".

Credits:

Audio & SFX: Mark Sparling (@Markymark665)

Art & programming: Tony Mtz (@_tonymtz)

Any feedback is really appreciated!
